trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for XPS package serialization policies.
trans-unit.target: Definisce la classe di base per i criteri di serializzazione del pacchetto XPS.

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe è astratta.

trans-unit.source: Packaging policy classes provide methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different types of parts in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Le classi del criterio forniscono metodi per l'acquisizione di serializzazione lettori e writer per diversi tipi di parti di un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.BasePackagingPolicy" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Se sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.BasePackagingPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the object.
trans-unit.target: L'ID dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, acquisisce un flusso di risorsa per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, acquisisce un flusso di risorsa per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, acquisisce un flusso di risorsa per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" />.

trans-unit.source: The resource ID of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> resource stream to acquire.
trans-unit.target: ID risorsa del flusso della risorsa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> da acquisire.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, acquires an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> with a specified resource ID.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, acquisisce <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> con un ID risorsa specificato.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] resource stream for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> with the specified <paramref name="resourceID" />.
trans-unit.target: Il flusso della risorsa del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] per <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> con il <paramref name="resourceID" />specificato.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the object.
trans-unit.target: L'ID dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, acquisisce un flusso di risorsa per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" />.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the object.
trans-unit.target: L'ID dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, acquisisce un flusso di risorsa per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a list of strings, each expressing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, si ottiene un elenco di stringhe, ciascuna delle quali esprime l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.String" /> objects that represent the linkable targets for a page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.String" /> che rappresentano le destinazioni con collegamento per una pagina.

trans-unit.source: Use the list to compose `LinkTarget` elements that can be inserted into the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> element for the corresponding page.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare l'elenco per comporre `LinkTarget` gli elementi che possono essere inseriti i <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> elemento per la pagina corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: Wrap each string in the list in markup by using the following form:
trans-unit.target: Eseguire il wrapping di ogni stringa nell'elenco nel markup utilizzando il formato seguente:

trans-unit.source: `<LinkTarget Name=\"` *target name* `\" />`, where *target name* is the string.
trans-unit.target: `<LinkTarget Name=\"` *Nome destinazione* `\" />`, dove *nome destinazione* è una stringa.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<PageContent.LinkTargets>` and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> elements, see chapter 3 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul `<PageContent.LinkTargets>` e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> elementi, vedere il capitolo 3 nella [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current page.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce un <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per la pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per la pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, restituisce un <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed document that is processing.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, si ottiene [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del documento fisso che si sta elaborando.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> del documento corrente.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page that is processing.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, si ottiene [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] della pagina fissa che si sta elaborando.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> della pagina corrente.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides information about how a print job prints.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto che fornisce informazioni sulle modalità di stampa di un processo di stampa.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes a print ticket to a package or to a part of the package.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, scrive un print ticket ad un package o ad una parte del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non convalida né modifica l'oggetto specificato `printTicket` per un particolare <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessario, utilizzare il <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> metodo per creare un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> specifico di <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> ed è valido per una stampante specificata.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs any required maintenance tasks before the page is committed, for example, flushes streams.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, esegue qualsiasi attività di manutenzione richiesta prima che la pagina sia sottoposta a commit, ad esempio, vengono svuotati i flussi.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] della risorsa.

trans-unit.source: A name for the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Un nome per la relazione.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to some internal or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, aggiunge una relazione dalla pagina corrente ad alcune risorse interne o esterne.

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] parti della relazione nei pacchetti, vedere il capitolo 1 il [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) dello schema.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the font.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] del tipo di carattere.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to a font.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, aggiunge una relazione dalla pagina corrente ad un tipo di carattere.

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] parti della relazione nei pacchetti, vedere il capitolo 1 il [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) dello schema.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l’oggetto corrente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext" /> .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l’oggetto corrente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont" /> .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l’oggetto corrente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> .

trans-unit.source: The ID of the resource that is released.
trans-unit.target: ID della risorsa rilasciata.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l’oggetto corrente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l’oggetto corrente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage" /> .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream" /> per l’oggetto corrente <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary" /> .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, releases the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, rilascia il <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> per il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro supporta l'infrastruttura di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.
